nodes.text: Manifold Mollusk Matrix and Matrimony Association
The Manifold Mollusk Matrix and Matrimony Association was an organization whose technical director was Skreen.

The Manifold Mollusk Matrix and Matrimony Association was mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
